mapper.sql: select id, dict_name, dict_type, status, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark, from sys_dict_type
mapper.select:
SELECT count(1) FROM sys_dict_type t WHERE 1 = 1
AND t.dict_name like concat('%', #{dictName}, '%')
and t.dict_type like concat('%', #{dictType}, '%')
and t.`status` = =#{status}

SELECT t.id, t.dict_type, t.dict_name, t.`status`, d.dict_value AS statusName, t.create_by, u.user_name AS createByName, t.create_time, t.update_by, u1.user_name AS updateByName, t.update_time, t.remark FROM sys_dict_type t LEFT JOIN sys_dict_data d ON t.`status` = d.dict_code AND d.dict_type = 'status' LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.user_login = t.create_by LEFT JOIN sys_user u1 ON u1.user_login = t.update_by WHERE 1 = 1
AND t.dict_name like concat('%', #{type.dictName}, '%')
and t.dict_type like concat('%', #{type.dictType}, '%')
and t.`status` = =#{type.status}
order by t.id
SELECT count(1) FROM sys_dict_type t WHERE t.dict_type = #{type}
